column3: We all need each other.

When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.
Who, being loved, is poor?
The first duty of love is to listen.
When love is not madness, it is not love.
Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
Love is metaphysical gravity.
Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
The ear is the avenue to the heart.
Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
Choose your love, Love your choice.
Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.

Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
Give a child love, laughter and peace, not AIDS.

When the satisfaction or the security of another person becomes as significant to one as one's own satisfaction or security, then the state of love exists. Under no other circumstances is a state of love present, regardless of the popular usage of the term.

It is my goal to love everyone. I hate no one. Regardless of their race, religion, their proclivities, the desire of their heart and how they want to live their life and the decisions that they make. I can even respect people's decisions and lifestyle choices just as I hope they have the courtesy to respect my decisions and my choices.
If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
To be fond of dancing was a certain step towards falling in love.

Business underlies everything in our national life, including our spiritual life. Witness the fact that in the Lord's Prayer, the first petition is for daily bread. No one can worship God or love his neighbor on an empty stomach.
What I love most about animation is, it's a team sport, and everything we do is about pure imagination.
I honestly, sincerely love what I do.
Love is too young to know what conscience is.
